name: Spectra
description: Spectra is a classic oscilloscope-themed robot who is a proud member of the WebtrES club. With its sleek cat-like box body, soldier buttons, and classic arms and legs, Spectra embodies both elegance and strength. Its vibrant screen displays a retro game of snake, adding a touch of nostalgia to its appearance. Equipped with stylish glasses, Spectra possesses a keen eye for detail and precision. It is a valued member of the club, known for its exceptional abilities and dedication to the advancement of technology.
